targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("requests-received"), 1s) AS "qps" FROM "cacheserve.server.statistics" WHERE "host-name" =~ /^($hostname)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("lookups"), 1s) AS "lps" FROM "cacheserve.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host-name" =~ /^($hostname)$/ GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("rate-limited-requests"), 1s) AS "rlq" FROM "cacheserve.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host-name" =~ /^($hostname)$/ GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)
SELECT min("recursion-contexts-in-use") AS "rc" FROM "cacheserve.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host-name" =~ /^($hostname)$/ GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("prefetch-extensions"), 1s) AS "prefetch-extensions" FROM "cacheserve.resolver.statistics" WHERE "key" = 'pm-resolver' AND $timeFilter AND "host-name" =~ /^($hostname)$/ GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("malformed-requests-dropped"), 1s) AS "malformed-requests-dropped" FROM "cacheserve.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host-name" =~ /^($hostname)$/ GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("formerr-loop-dropped"), 1s) AS "formerr-loop-dropped" FROM "cacheserve.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host-name" =~ /^($hostname)$/ GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("suppressed-duplicate-queries"), 1s) AS "suppressed-duplicate-queries" FROM "cacheserve.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host-name" =~ /^($hostname)$/ GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("requests-no-view"), 1s) AS "no-view" FROM "cacheserve.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host-name" =~ /^($hostname)$/ GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("tcp-connections-accepted"), 1s) AS "tcp-connections-accepted" FROM "cacheserve.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host-name" =~ /^($hostname)$/ GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("tcp-connections-rejected"), 1s) AS "tcp-connections-rejected" FROM "cacheserve.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host-name" =~ /^($hostname)$/ GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("tcp-clients"), 1s) AS "tcp-clients" FROM "cacheserve.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host-name" =~ /^($hostname)$/ GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("tcp-requests-sent"), 1s) AS "tcp-requests-sent" FROM "cacheserve.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host-name" =~ /^($hostname)$/ GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("rcode-value"), 1s) AS "rps" FROM "cacheserve.resolver.statistics" WHERE "host-name" =~ /^($hostname)$/ AND "key" = 'pm-resolver' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name", rcode fill(null)

SELECT mean("thread-type-value") AS "licensed-cu" FROM "cacheserve.server.usage" WHERE "host-name" =~ /^($hostname)$/ AND "thread-type" = 'udp.threads' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(previous)
SELECT mean("num-cpus") AS "total-cores" FROM "cacheserve.server.information" WHERE "host-name" =~ /^($hostname)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(previous)

select min(utime) + min(stime) as cpu from (select non_negative_derivative(min("thread-type-value"), 1s) as utime from "cacheserve.server.usage" where "host-name"=~ /^($hostname)$/ AND "thread-type" = 'udp.user-time' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)), (select non_negative_derivative(min("thread-type-value"), 1s) as stime from "cacheserve.server.usage" where "host-name"=~ /^($hostname)$/ AND "thread-type" = 'udp.system-time' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)
SELECT min("memory-in-use") AS "memory" FROM "cacheserve.server.usage" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host-name" =~ /^($hostname)$/ GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("provisioning.update-count"), 1s) AS "update rate" FROM "cacheserve.layer.status" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host-name" =~ /^($hostname)$/ GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

SELECT (min("provisioning.current-time") - min("provisioning.last-update")) AS "update lag" FROM "cacheserve.layer.status" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host-name" =~ /^($hostname)$/ GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

SELECT 1- ("recursive-lookups" / lookups) as "cache-hit-rate" FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("recursive-lookups"), 1s) AS "recursive-lookups", non_negative_derivative(mean("lookups"), 1s) AS lookups FROM "cacheserve.resolver.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host-name" =~ /^($hostname)$/  GROUP BY time($__interval), "host-name" fill(null)) GROUP BY "host-name"

SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("requests-sent"), 1s) AS "requests-sent" FROM "cacheserve.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host-name" =~ /^($hostname)$/ GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("responses-received"), 1s) AS "responses-received" FROM "cacheserve.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host-name" =~ /^($hostname)$/ GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

list.label: Cacheserve Hostname
list.name: hostname
list.query: show tag values from "cacheserve.server.statistics" with key = "host-name"
